snippet: Well before most coffee drinkers feel the chill of fall, a pumpkin spice latte battle is heating up as Starbucks and Panera promote new versions of the popular drink.
abstract: Starbucks and Panera both announce that new versions of their pumpkin spice lattes will be made with real pumpkin and without artificial colorings; Starbucks had been criticized in 2014 for lack of transparency regarding ingredients in popular seasonal drink.
lead_paragraph: Well before most coffee drinkers feel the chill of fall, a pumpkin spice latte battle is heating up as Starbucks and Panera promote new versions of the popular drink.

headline.main: At Starbucks and Panera, Pumpkin Coffee Drinks Will Contain Pumpkin
headline.print_headline: Pumpkin Coffee Drinks Will Contain Pumpkin
